name: go-shp-chrome-extension
description: Chrome Extension for a go lang secure HTTP proxy.

scripts.gen-icon: rsvg-convert -h 128 resources/icon.svg > public/icon.png && rsvg-convert -h 128 resources/icon_off.svg > public/icon_off.png && rsvg-convert -h 128 resources/icon_auto.svg > public/icon_auto.png

author: Yingyu Cheng
